name: Grapple Blast!
description:
The Matrix meets Interstellar meets the mighty grappling hook!

Grapple Blast is a fast-paced action-packed momentum-based speedrunning game where you manipulate time and use your trusty grappling hook to defeat enemies and evade dangerous obstacles blazing fast. A stranded astronaut finds himself in a strange galaxy and you must help him escape unscathed!

Challenge yourself to achieve the highest style rank by completing levels as quickly as possible!

This is our submission for the Lost Relic Game Jam 2022. The only assets used are the level backgrounds, which are free on the asset store and have been edited to fit the game.
